item.title: Update ESXI via command
item.description: VMware ESXI can be updated via command line, here is a quick reference download latest patch from vmware web site https://customerconnect.vmware.com/patch. ESXI patch should be cumulative, therefore, download the latest one upload the patch to esxi datastore enable esxi ssh via web management console login esxi ssh root@server-ip and run below commend esxcli software vib update -d "/vmfs/volumes/datastore1//ESXi600-201605001.zip" reboot -f done
